description: Manage bank accounts and transfer money

slots.name: account_type
slots.description: The account type of the user

slots.name: recipient_account_type
slots.description: The account type of the recipient whom the user is transfering money to

slots.name: balance
slots.description: The amount of money held in a bank account at a given time

slots.name: amount
slots.description: The amount of money to transfer

slots.name: recipient_account_name
slots.description: The account name of the recipient who is to receive the transfered money

intents.name: CheckBalance
intents.description: Check the amount of money in a user's bank account

intents.name: TransferMoney
intents.description: Transfer money from one bank account to another user's account
